# Interface TelemetryConfigInterface

Main configuration for telemetry system initialization

#### Description

Comprehensive configuration object for setting up telemetry

interface TelemetryConfigInterface {  
apiKey: string;  
appName?: string;  
appVersion?: string;  
endpoint?: string;  
exporterType?: [ExporterType](/enums/telemetry.ExporterType);  
logger?: [LoggerConfigInterface](./telemetry.LoggerConfigInterface);  
tracer?: [TracerConfigInterface](./telemetry.TracerConfigInterface);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

apiKey appName? appVersion? endpoint? exporterType? logger? tracer?

## Properties

### apiKey

apiKey: string

API key for telemetry service authentication

#### Required

#### Description

Required for authenticating with the telemetry service

### `Optional`appName

appName?: string

Application name for service identification

#### Optional

#### Description

Used as [service.name](http://service.name) and [app.name](http://app.name) in telemetry attributes

#### Default


```
DEFAULT_TELEMETRY_APP_NAME

```


### `Optional`appVersion

appVersion?: string

Application version for tracking deployments

#### Optional

#### Description

Used as service.version and app.version in telemetry attributes

#### Default


```
DEFAULT_TELEMETRY_APP_VERSION

```


### `Optional`endpoint

endpoint?: string

Telemetry endpoint URL

#### Optional

#### Description

Where telemetry data will be sent. If not provided, uses environment-based endpoint

### `Optional`exporterType

exporterType?: [ExporterType](/enums/telemetry.ExporterType)

Type of telemetry exporter to use

#### Optional

#### Default


```
ExporterType.REMOTE

```


#### Description

Determines where telemetry data is exported

### `Optional`logger

logger?: [LoggerConfigInterface](./telemetry.LoggerConfigInterface)

Logger configuration settings

#### Optional

#### Description

Controls logging behavior and verbosity

### `Optional`tracer

tracer?: [TracerConfigInterface](./telemetry.TracerConfigInterface)

Tracer configuration settings

#### Optional

#### Description

Controls distributed tracing behavior

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
